name: Animus Spellcaster

specials.name: Animus Being
specials.description: An animus is the exact duplicate of a single creature that came within 10 feet of an animus mural. The animusâ€™ only desire in life is to find its duplicate, kill them, and replace them. The animus looks exactly like its target, except for having an animal head. All equipment and items on an animus dissolve to dust if the animus is killed.

specials.name: Sense Duplicate
specials.description: An animus knows the exact direction and distance of their duplicate (as long as both are on the same plane).

specials.name: Drain Bonded Item
specials.description: Frequency once per day; Requirements The animus hasn't acted yet on this turn; Effect The animus expends the power stored in their staff. This gives them the ability to cast one prepared spell they prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot.

specials.name: Hated Duplicate
specials.description: The animus deals an additional 2d6 mental damage to its duplicate.
